name: Aghermann
summary: Manage EEG recordings, view and score EDF files, and simulate Process S
description: Aghermann is a program designed around a common workflow in sleep-research, complete with scoring facility; cairo subpixel drawing on screen or to file; conventional PSD and EEG Micrcontinuity profiles; Independent Component Analysis; artifact detection; and Process S simulation following Achermann et al, 1993.
